title: Wait for 40 minutes to queue as a solo into a 5-man.
body:
"98% of the time, 5-man will be against 5-man." EleGiggle

 MATCHMAKING BALANCE **Improved at all skill levels**
QUEUE TIMES **Reduced** at the top end of the MMR spectrum
PREMADE EQUALITY 5-man premades are now matched up against other 5-man premades **98% of the time **

https://imgflip.com/s/meme/Laughing-Villains.jpg 

^^^^^Rare Footage of Riot Games Top Decision-makers.

4Head Riot Game 4Head
